titleStmt.title: Terra australis incognita, or A new southerne discouerie, containing a fifth part of the vvorld. Lately found out by Ferdinand de Quir, a Spanish captaine. Neuer before published. Translated by W.B.
Relacion de un memorial que ha presentado Pedro Fernandez de Quir. English
titleStmt.author: Queirós, Pedro Fernandes de, d. 1615.
W. B., fl. 1613-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [By B. Norton and J. Bill] for Iohn Hodgetts,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Relacion de un memorial que ha presentado Pedro Fernandez de Quir.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" in part of a woodcut.
Variant: lacking "Translated by W.B." on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
